titleStmt.title: An electronic transcription of Genizah Fragment TS AS 78.235
titleStmt.sponsor: Joseph and Rebecca Meyerhoff Center for Jewish Studies
Lieberman Institute; Primary Witnesses to Tannaitic Literature

publicationStmt.pubPlace: The Maryland Institute for Technology in the Humanities

notesStmt.note:
Fragment in the Cambridge University Libraries, Taylor-Schechter Collection. Covers Bava Metsi'a 1:5 - 2:10
Transcription from online images of the manuscript, available at http://jnul.huji.ac.il/dl/talmud/mishna/selmimnu.asp and at https://fgp.genizah.org. FGP nos. C99763 - C99764
TRANSCRIPTION: Nurit Ezer
EDITED BY: Hayim Lapin-->
